lemurproject.indri.ui

Class DocLinkListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • lemurproject.indri.ui.DocLinkListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.HyperlinkListener

    public class DocLinkListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.event.HyperlinkListener
    Simple pop an internal frame for hyperlinks. Spawns a new JFrame to hold the individuals.
    Author:
    David Fisher
